title: Naica and the squirrel
creator_credit: Bucuresti Film Studios and Elisabeta Bostan
brief_description: The story of a little boy who leaves his parents’ farm to track a hen-stealing fox in the snow-clad forest. In an abandoned hut he befriends some squirrels. First Prize, Venice Biennial-International Exhibition of Children’s Films 1967.
